use-case.title: User enrolls in a course
use-case.pre: The system is running and the user is logged in with the rights of a student.
use-case.post: The system is still running, the user is still logged in.
use-case.success: The user is enrolled in the chosen courses.
use-case.ev: User selects a course instance from a list of course instances.
GUI displays details about the course instance data, e.g. main lecturer, lesson period, different course element instances
User selects varies course element instances.
GUI inserts data into the database with the association between person to course instance and person to course element instance.
use-case.note: The implementation is based on the relation CourseElementInstance and not on the ProposedScheduling.
use-case.q: Do we provide a grading system, e.g. checking if enough course element instances were chosen? No, but the relational schema allows the implementation of checks. A complete grading system could be implemented in
